Title: Fight Chat Control (@chatcontrol@mastodon.social)
Description:
Attached: 1 image

Danish Minister of Justice and chief architect of the current Chat Control proposal, Peter Hummelgaard:

"We must break with the totally erroneous perception that it is everyone's civil liberty to communicate on encrypted messaging services."

Share your thoughts via https://fightchatcontrol.eu/, or to jm@jm.dk directly.

Source: https://www.ft.dk/samling/20231/almdel/REU/spm/1426/index.htm

Title: Beyond Orthogonality: How Language Models Pack Billions of Concepts into 12,000 Dimensions
Description:
In a recent 3Blue1Brown video series on transformer models, Grant Sanderson posed a fascinating question: How can a relatively modest embedding space of 12,288 dimensions (GPT-3) accommodate millions of distinct real-world concepts?

Title: Writing an operating system kernel from scratch
Description: Exploring a minimal implementation of a time-sharing kernel on RISC-V, implemented in Zig, on top of OpenSBI.

Title: Why are Event-Driven Systems Hard?
Description: Understanding the Core Challenges of Asynchronous Architectures
